title: This 1-Bedroom/1-Bathroom apartment is located on the top floor of a four-unit b
description:
Beautiful 1-Bedroom Apartment Available in Cobbs Creek! PHA Vouchers Accepted! - This 1-Bedroom/1-Bathroom apartment is located on the top floor of a four-unit building in the Cobbs Creek neighborhood of West Philadelphia! This location offers easy access to Chestnut Street, Walnut Street, and Baltimore Ave. and there is also easy access to public transportation.
There is a common entrance to the building and a staircase that leads you up to the entry door of the apartment. Enjoy the peace and quiet of being on the top floor of the building with no neighbors above you! The apartment includes a large kitchen complete with stone tile flooring, oak cabinets that offer plenty of storage, formica countertops, full-sized refrigerator, and four-burner electric range! The kitchen is large enough to accommodate a moveable island or a small dining set if you'd like to create an eat-in kitchen.
Located off of the kitchen is the spacious living room. The living room includes brand new carpet flooring, oversized windows which allow plenty of natural light to pour in, and central lighting! There is enough room to comfortably fit a sectional, coffee table, TV stand, side tables, and more!
The bathroom is located down the hallway and includes stone tile flooring, a pedestal sink with medicine cabinet, and a full-sized bathtub/shower with beautiful tile surround! There is also a closet just outside of the bathroom for storing your linens and other bathroom supplies.
The bedroom is located at the back of the apartment and is large enough to fit a king-sized bed! There is a ceiling fan which is perfect for air circulation and a closet that is large enough to accommodate your entire wardrobe. You will have a hard time finding a larger bedroom than this one in a 1-bedroom apartment!

description: Campus Apartments provides an affordable and private home away from home where students and professionals can live, work, and study in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. description:

title: Live at Park Towne Place Apartment Homes in Center City Philadelphia
description:

Unit features modern kitchens, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washers and dryers, breakfast bars, pendant lighting, tile backsplashes, wood plank flooring throughout, walk-in closets. Fitness center with Technogym equipment, Queenax boxing gym, yoga/spin studio with indoor/outdoor workout space. It boasts Philadelphia's largest pools, an art studio, fitness center with boxing gym, yoga/spin studio, social lounge with demonstration kitchen, gourmet market and cafe, outdoor lounge with fire pit, 24-hour concierge, 24/7 package acceptance, resident shuttle service to Center City and University City and more. Make Whole Foods as your second kitchen conveniently located just 1 block away. Our apartments are within one mile of several institutions of higher education: Drexel University, Temple University, University of Penn, CHOP, Moore college of Arts, Community College of Philadelphia. You won't find a better building to live with amenities in the Fairmount Area. Park Towne Place includes 948 apartment and penthouse homes within four high-rise towers. description:

Enjoy luxurious newer construction in Naval Square, Center City's premiere gated community in close proximity to South Street Bridge, Fitler Square, Rittenhouse Square, Schuylkill River Park, UPENN, CHOP and HUP. This spacious condo with 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths and 1 dedicated parking space in the heated underground garage is in meticulous condition, has been freshly painted and features an open floor plan with high ceilings, new hardwood floors, large windows with new window treatments, ceiling fans, and recessed lighting throughout. Large living room has Juliet balcony with view of the gorgeous pool, trees and green space. Spacious master bedroom offers two closets, tiled shower, granite counters and a large soaking tub. Additional features include spacious second bedroom, second upgraded full bath, washer and dryer, foyer closet and linen closet. Located in the newer Pemberton Manor, a quiet, well maintained building with underground heated parking garage with storage space, this unit is literally next door to the pool, gym and dance/yoga studio with private access exclusively for Pemberton residents... it's like having your own personal fitness center! title: 249-51 N 2nd St #1R
description: CHARACTER-FILLED Condo in Old City! Location, garage parking, hardwood flooring, and so much more awaits within the walls of unit #1R! The 3BD/2.5BA bi-level design is delicately crafted and completely sun soaked. Upon entering, you will immediately notice the beautiful hardwood flooring and a perfect entry space for bikes, strollers, scooters, or an entry table. The 1st floor includes a private bedroom and full bathroom. This entry level bedroom features hardwood flooring, a large, walk-in closet, and a private bath complete with a large stall shower, tile flooring, and a stackable washer/dryer within the closet. Talk about an ideal guest bedroom! Venture upstairs to find the main living space, kitchen, two additional bedrooms plus 1.5 baths! The sleek and stylish kitchen is equipped with warm wood, shaker cabinetry, granite countertops, and stainless-steel appliances with a smart refrigerator! Make your way out of the kitchen and through the archways to find your spacious living area! The hardwood flooring, multiple windows, and exposed brick fill the main living area with ease. The oversized windows allow for plenty of natural light to fill the space nicely. Plus, the space is wide open; a perfect blank canvas for any buyer! The main bedroom is large and includes 2 closets, one being a walk-in closet, and a full ensuite bathroom completed with a large vanity and shower/tub combo! The last bedroom is full of windows and very versatile, could serve as a home office, workout room, additional living space, you name it! It also comes with a large closet - great for storage! Not to mention, the private, one car garage parking spot! The LOCATION is also perfect with this home. Situated right in Old City, restaurants, entertainment, and the story of Philadelphia is everywhere you turn! Just head down Arch, Market, or Chestnut St. for unbelievable dining options. Tunabar, Le Peg, Morgan's Pier, Race Street Cafe, Positano Coast, Spasso, Panorama, just to name a few. Take a trip to any of the historical sites, stroll down quaint brick, tree lined streets or head to the waterfront on a sunny day. The bike & running path along the Delaware is minutes away as well as the local markets in Cherry Street Pier; the options are endless! Commuting is also a breeze thanks to the highway routes and local metro & bus stops. Does this sound like your new home? If so, do not wait! Schedule your showing now!! Short term lease only (6 months)

title: Wonderful opportunity to live in the historic landmark Colonnade Build
description:
Built in 1932 as The Wills Eyes Institute, today it has blossomed into a beautiful condo conversion with modern amenities including a doorman, secured entrance, and a gorgeous atrium that is currently under renovation with a world-class designer. This is moderate-sized boutique building is home to 115 units. Unit 409 is newly renovated with state-of-the-art finishes. Stainless steel appliances, gorgeous warm chestnut cabinets with built-in diamond wine rack, and glass bar. onyx granite counters with flecks of gold. Venetian stone backsplash with gilded rope details with an elaborate crystal chandelier over the kitchen island. Blonde kitchen floor tiles. Maple hardwood floors in the living area and bedroom with nice size closets and windows for plenty of natural light. Custom designer paint throughout. Enter into the master bath with Venetian stone tile with sea glass accents and a custom vanity mirror with Frigidaire stackable washer and dryer. The building is equipped with a fitness room and storage area in the basement. Walking distance to essentially everything Philly has to offer. Subway, bus lines, 76, 95, Center City, Kelly Drive area cafes, music venues, restaurants, fitness centers, boot camps, and Crossfit. You want it, we got it! This lovely home can come partially furnished with two comfortable leather couches, a small dining table, and a fully stocked kitchen (utensils, pots/pans, etc.) for 50 more a month.
1601 Spring Garden St #409

title: Spacious 3 Bed, 1.5 Bath Home Situated in the Exciting Northern Libert
description:
Welcome to 941 N Randolph Street! This is a spacious 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath home situated in the exciting Northern Liberties section of Philadelphia and is now available for rent. On the entry level you will find a large living room, formal dining room, and an updated/modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, a large island, and a wine fridge. The rear of this main level provides a mud room and a convenient, updated, and chic powder room. Moving up one level you will find two spacious bedrooms and a full bath with tub/shower combo. Top-level offers a loft-style bedroom that can be used as a bedroom, an office, bonus room or a workout room. You are sure to enjoy the fenced rear yard which offers privacy and plenty of room for a table and chairs. The basement provides the laundry area as well as additional living and storage space. The property is located on a quiet and serene street that does not see much traffic. Within walking distance you can access Liberty Lands Park & Community Garden, gastro pubs like Standard Tap, and the Piazza - An open air plaza surrounded by unique artisans shops, bottle shops, a record store and boutiques. This area has an exceptional walk score and easy access to public transportation. Your new home is just a few clicks away, inquire now and be settled into this cozy home soon in time to enjoy the holiday season! (Furry friends -- pets will be considered on a case by case basis).
941 N Randolph St

title: RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BED, 1 BATH CORNER UNIT, WITH 2-CAR PARKING!
description:
830 S Howard St #2 is a recently renovated 2 bed, 1 bath corner unit with 2-car parking on the top level of a duplex in Philadelphia's vibrant Queen Village neighbourhood. At the front of the building, an idyllic courtyard with gardens and picnic seating greets you. Soaring cathedral ceilings and new luxury flooring frame the bright and airy living room inside the unit. Three windows and a skylight bring in natural light, and a fourth window illuminates the separate dining area. The kitchen has new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, as well as plenty of cabinet and counter space. There is also space for additional storage or a small table. A sleek full bathroom with modern fixtures, a glass-enclosed shower, and an updated vanity can be found down the hall. Two spacious bedrooms round out the unit. The main bedroom has a wet bar and sliding doors that lead to a Trex deck that spans the width of the unit. The shared laundry area of the building is on the ground floor, as is an entry from this unit's one garage parking spot and one driveway parking spot. 830 S Howard's excellent Queen Village location receives a Walk Score of 93! Markets, restaurants, and cafes on nearby South St include Whole Foods, ACME, Good Karma, and Bridget Foy's. South of Washington Ave, E Moyamensing Ave is lined with neighbourhood favourites Herman's Coffee, Charlie's Roast Pork, and Pennsport Beer Boutique. A few blocks away are the Shot Tower playground and rec centre, as well as Target, Acme, Wine & Spirits, Ikea, and Lowes. I-76 connects to public transportation, Old City, I-95, and South Jersey. Make an appointment for an in-person or virtual tour today!
830 S Howard Street Ct #2

title: You'll Fall In Love With All The Charming Details In This 4B Unit!!
description:
Beautiful 4B/2B apartment! This unit offers a private entrance to newly renovated unit. Modern kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Newly ceramic tile floors and carpeted bedrooms. Four spacious bedrooms, all with great closet space. Some rooms offer a "bonus room" which can be used as an office or additional storage. Some bedrooms offer walk-in closets. Individually controlled central heating and air conditioning. Unit includes washer/dryer. Cats are welcome (add'l fee)! Apartment is rented unfurnished.
Chancellor Apartments is a convenient high rise apartment community in an amazing location in Center City. We are close to most major schools and universities, public transportation, historical attractions, shopping, restaurants and theaters. Center City at its best!!
Rent includes: Water, 24-hour front desk attendant, free bike storage room, package acceptance service, 24-hour emergency maintenance service, BuildingLink resident services portal access for all residents.
The Chancellor boasts several different studio and one bedroom floor plans. Apartments feature high ceilings, large bright windows, ceiling fans in most units, hardwood floors and breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline and Delaware River. Many apartments have large walk-in closets, too!
We have partnered with Optimal Sport Health Club to offer a generous discounted gym membership (we pay your initiation fee!). There are several off street parking lots and garages in the area, too!

description:
Studio apartment with parquet wood floors throughout at The Philadelphian! This home is located on a high floor and boasts gorgeous city views from a private terrace accessible via the sun-soaked living area. Adjacent, there is an updated, open kitchen showcasing great cabinetry space, a gold light fixture and a breakfast bar. When the need should arise to leave the premises, the building offers a shuttle bus that runs all day long dropping off and picking up residents throughout Center City. Residents also enjoy a 24 hour doorman, indoor and outdoor pools, and fitness center.

General info to review BEFORE applying:
Your monthly gross income must total three times (3x) the monthly rent amount to qualify. Applicant must provide a minimum of two (2) paystubs and/or proof of income through bank statements showing direct deposits.

Then, anytime before move-in day we require the remaining first & last month's rent.
We allow pets under the condition that the security deposit be increased according to your individual situation.
Greenzang does not accept applicants utilizing a subsidized housing program, such as Section 8.
Any outstanding questions you may have can be discussed in-person at the property viewing.
Thanks, I sincerely look forward to meeting you soon!
